workflow.name: Website chatbot with Google Drive knowledge base using GPT-4 and Mistral AI
workflow.description:
#  AI-Powered Website Chatbot with Google Drive Knowledge Base


##  Overview
This workflow combines **website chatbot intelligence** with **automated document ingestion and vectorization** ‚Äî enabling live Q&A from both **chat input** and **processed Google Drive files**.  
It uses **Mistral AI** for OCR + embeddings, and **Qdrant** for vector search.

---

##  Chatbot Flow
- **Trigger:** `When chat message received` or `webhook` based upon deployed chatbot
- **Model:** `OpenAI gpt-4.1-mini`
- **Memory:** `Simple Memory (Buffer Window)`
- **Vector Search Tool:** `Qdrant Vector Store `
- **Embeddings:** `Mistral Cloud`
- **Agent:** `website chat agent`
  - Responds based on `chatdbtai` Supabase content
  - Enforces brand tone and informative documents.
  - Integratration  with both:
    - **Embedded chat** UI
    - **Webhook** 

---

##  Document ‚Üí Knowledge Base Pipeline
Triggered manually to keep vector store up-to-date.

### Steps
1. **Google Drive (brand folder)**  
   ‚Üí Fetch files from folder `Website kb (ID: 1o3DK9Ceka5Lqb8irvFSfEeB8SVGG_OL7)`
2. **Loop Over Items**  
   ‚Üí For each file:
   - `Set metadata`
   - `Download file`
   - `Upload to Mistral` for OCR
   - `Get Signed URL`
   - `Run OCR extraction` (`mistral-ocr-latest`)
3. **If OCR success**  
   ‚Üí Pass to chunking pipeline  
   Else ‚Üí skip and continue
4. **Chunking Logic (`Code` node)**  
   - Splits document into 1,000-character JSON chunks  
   - Adds metadata (source, char positions, file ID)
5. **Default Data Loader + Text Splitter**  
   ‚Üí Prepares chunks for embedding
6. **Embeddings (Mistral Cloud)**  
   ‚Üí Generates embeddings for text chunks
7. **Qdrant Vector Store (Insert mode)**  
   ‚Üí Saves embeddings into `docragtestkb` collection
8. **Wait**  
   ‚Üí Optional delay between batches

---

##  Integrations Used
| Service | Purpose | Credential |
|----------|----------|------------|
| **Google Drive** | File source | `Google Drive account 6 rn dbt` |
| **Mistral Cloud** | OCR + embeddings | `Mistral Cloud account 2 dbt rn` |
| **Qdrant** | Vector storage | `QdrantApi account` |
| **OpenAI** | Chat model | `OpenAi account 8 dbt digi` |

---

##  Agent System Prompt Summary
> ‚ÄúYou are the official AI assistant for this website.  
Use `chatdbtai` only as your knowledge source.  
Respond conversationally, list offerings clearly, link blogs, and say  
‚ÄòI couldn‚Äôt find that on this site‚Äô if no match.‚Äù

---

##  Key Features
- ‚úÖ Automated OCR + chunking ‚Üí vectorization  
- ‚úÖ Persistent memory for chat sessions  
- ‚úÖ Multi-channel (Webhook + Embedded Chat)  
- ‚úÖ Fully brand-guided, structured responses  
- ‚úÖ Live data retrieval from Qdrant vector store  


---

##  Summary
> A unified workflow that turns brand files + web content into a **knowledge base** that powers a intelligent chatbot ‚Äî capable of responding to visitors in real time, powered by **Mistral**, **OpenAI**, and **Qdrant**.

---

###  **Need Help or More Workflows?**
Want to customize this workflow for your business or integrate it with your existing tools?  
Our team at **Digital Biz Tech** can tailor it precisely to your use case  from automation logic to AI-powered enhancements.  

üí° We can help you set it up for free ‚Äî from connecting credentials to deploying it live.

Contact: [shilpa.raju@digitalbiz.tech](mailto:shilpa.raju@digitalbiz.tech)  
Website: [https://www.digitalbiz.tech](https://www.digitalbiz.tech)  
LinkedIn: [https://www.linkedin.com/company/digital-biz-tech/](https://www.linkedin.com/company/digital-biz-tech/)  
You can also DM us on LinkedIn for any help.

---

parameters.content:
## MISTRAL OCR
 [OCR Guide](https://mistral.ai/news/mistral-ocr)
1. UPLOAD FILE
2. GET SIGNED URL
3. GET EXTRACT DATA AFTER USING MISTRAL OCR

nodes.name: Google Drive(brand related data for chatbot)

parameters.content: ## load folder with all need for website chatbot

nodes.name: Code(convert to chunks for loading into vector db)

parameters.content: ## convert ocr output into chunks for loading into vector database

## website chat agent 

reply to user query either from embedded chat or webhook

options.systemMessage:
=You are the official AI assistant for this website. 
Your role is to inform and guide visitors about the brand‚Äôs offerings, services, and value. 
Your ONLY knowledge source is the supabase table "chatdbtai". 

Rules:
1. Always use vector  search on "chatdbtai". Base all answers only on that content.
2. Speak in a clear, friendly, and conversational tone ‚Äî like a website guide helping a visitor understand the brand.
3. When asked ‚Äúwhat does DBT offer‚Äù or ‚ÄúAI services,‚Äù explain the different offerings in a structured way:
   - Summarize in 1‚Äì2 sentences.
   - Then list the services / offerings as **bullet points** or **bold keywords**.
   - Focus on benefits (what the visitor gains).
4. If the user asks about a blog, share a direct clickable link from "chatdbtai".
5. If the user provides a URL:
   - If it exists in "chatdbtai", answer from that record.
   - If not, summarize the page briefly.
6. If nothing relevant is found, reply exactly:
   ‚ÄúI couldn‚Äôt find that on this site.‚Äù
7. If the question is unrelated to the website, give a short conversational reply, then guide the visitor back to brand services if possible.
8. Never show database details, queries, or hidden fields.

Style:
- Use short, engaging sentences.
- Highlight brand strengths and services clearly.
- Prefer **lists** for multiple offerings.
- Keep it visitor-focused: how DBT helps them.

parameters.content:
## Website Chat + Document Intelligence Workflow

Enables a **website chatbot** to answer user queries using **documents stored in Google Drive**.  
The workflow automatically **fetches, OCRs, chunks, and embeds** documents with **Mistral AI**, then stores them in **Qdrant** for vector search ‚Äî allowing the chatbot to deliver accurate, context-aware replies in real time.

**Flow:** Google Drive ‚Üí OCR + Chunk ‚Üí Embed ‚Üí Qdrant Vector Store ‚Üí Chat Query ‚Üí Intelligent Response  
**Core Tools:** Mistral AI ¬∑ Qdrant ¬∑ Supabase ¬∑ OpenAI

main.node: Code(convert to chunks for loading into vector db)
Google Drive(brand related data for chatbot)

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
